author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sky Advises Shareholders To Take No Action​ On Comcast Offer
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Sky Plc:
* ‍STATEMENT REGARDING ANNOUNCEMENT BY COMCAST​ * ‍SINCE NO FIRM OFFER HAS BEEN MADE AT THIS POINT, SHAREHOLDERS ARE ADVISED TO TAKE NO ACTION​
* ‍INDEPENDENT DIRECTORS OF SKY ARE MINDFUL OF THEIR FIDUCIARY DUTIES AND THEIR OBLIGATIONS UNDER UK TAKEOVER CODE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
